com.google.appinventor.client
Class MultiRegistry<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.MultiRegistry<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - class of the keys
V - class of the individual values
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandRegistry
public class MultiRegistry<K,V>
extends Object

A registry that manages lists of settings for classes. Multiple configuration values can be added to the same class.

Constructor Summary
protected MultiRegistry(Class<K> rootClass)
          Creates a new registry.
 
Method Summary
 List<V> get(Class<? extends K> key)
          Returns the list of configuration settings for the key class and all superclasses.
 List<V> get(K key)
          Convenience method that returns the configuration values of an object's class.
protected  void register(Class<? extends K> key, V value)
          Registers a single configuration setting that is added at the end of the list of configured values.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

register

protected void register(Class<? extends K> key,
                        V value)
Registers a single configuration setting that is added at the end of the list of configured values.

Parameters:

value - the configured value

public List<V> get(Class<? extends K> key)
Returns the list of configuration settings for the key class and all superclasses.

get

public List<V> get(K key)
Convenience method that returns the configuration values of an object's class.

Parameters:
key - the object for whose class to determine the configuration
Returns:
the object class's configuration values
